alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 11:03AM MST until February 03 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Crowley, Otero, Kiowa and Bent Counties, along with eastern Las Animas County. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning and evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
